page.title: 17Appleby Squash Courts
page.content: Appleby Squash Courts are a part of the Appleby Football Club.The squash courts are down Chapel Street,in the football field.the chairman of the squash courts is Mr. Mike Saint.When you join the squash club you get a key,so you can go in at anytime you like.If you want to join the leagues you have to visit Mr.Saint.When you are in the leagues you play matches and as you win matches you go up the leagues. There are two courts with a balcony above them.When your time is up the lights automatically go off.The squash courts are open nearly all day and until late at night.Men,women and children can play.I play squash and really enjoy it. In the club house there are lots of other activities.You can hire a room for a party or a disco.There are also dancing classes. Linzi Burrell
